website_summaries.verdict: Catcher's helmet design that's a little less bulky than some others, making it work well for younger players.
pros: Design is made to fit securely
Helmet moves as your head moves, rather than bouncing around as you move
Has vents all across the helmet to keep the player cooler behind the plate
Good level of foam padding for comfort
cons: Some size and color combinations are pricey
Fits tightly at the temple, so doesn't work well with eyeglasses

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet but wish there was an in between size.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son who is right between the small youth helmet size range, which he has been using for a couple years, and the adult size range. This helmet seems well made and was comfortable for him to wear. With his baseball cap under it it fit good enough but the issue for his age and height was the mask length. When he was in a squat the mask rested on his chest protector and he was really unable to turn his head. Returned this one due to this. Shame they don't make more of an in between size.
customer_reviews.author: Carolew

customer_reviews.title: Chinpad came off and lost after 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: The helmet worked fine for my son but after only 4 months of use the chin pad came off at some point and it's lost. There seems to be no inventory in replacements for it on the Easton website. Very disappointed about the chin pad situation. Guess I'll try to find a generic brand chin pad to replace it before this season starts.
customer_reviews.author: SamoanJoe

customer_reviews.title: Nice helmet
customer_reviews.text: The helmet was larger than I thought (fit wise) even when looking at the size chart. However, it has been great so far. I purchased used on Amazon but it looks like it was never touched. Used it only about 3 times since I purchased, but it has been great. Taken a couple foul balls to the face and I have been happy with the protection from the helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J Washko

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with purchase, hope to get another season or two of use before she outgrows it.
customer_reviews.text: It fit and protected my 10 year old daughter. She indicated it was comfortable and gave good visibility, at least compared to the one the team had previously been using which was ill fitting.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Product arrive on time. The helmet fits well. ...
customer_reviews.text: Product arrive on time. The helmet fits well. The adhesive to the back of velcro to hold chin pad pulled off. I may request a replacement of the same helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Roman Q. Burlingame, CA

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: My son has been through a lot of helmets over the years, and rates this as one of his favorites. Not too bulky, comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Rob P

customer_reviews.title: helmet run big !
customer_reviews.text: still send the wrong size order a smaller size going to send both back
customer_reviews.author: hmurhy

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son. It is a great helmet and gives him good protection. He is 15 and 6' 1" and it fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loved hi helmet. He's one sharp looking catcher.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: runs true to size but I went with another helmet.
customer_reviews.author: V Brim

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet, however glue on the chin cushion started ...
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet, however glue on the chin cushion started to give way. We put plastic bond glue on it and it is holding.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Hurts my ears.
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the helmets I used, this one was definitely not my favorite. Switch schools and I decided go with the Easton set. The gear is fine but this helmet I don’t like. Once you take a foul to the mask, it makes a loud bang where your ears will start ringing for a bit. My old Mizuno helmet would not do that.
customer_reviews.author: KZ ICE

product_meta.title: Easton M7 Catchers Helmet
product_meta.description: Streamlined Profile provides a snug fit that stays closer to your head and moves with you. ABS high grade shell for strength and durability. Dual Density foam padding provides protection and comfort. Keeps you cool behind the dish with 18 vents.
feature_bullets: Great for players of all caliber
Streamlined Profile provides a snug fit that stays closer to your head and moves with you
ABS high grade shell for strength and durability
Dual Density foam padding provides protection and comfort
Keeps you cool behind the dish with 18 vents
NOCSAE Approved: Meets the NOCSAE standard for Catcher's helmets
